response.overview: Cuervo Jones is a low level ‘gangsta’ who dreams of one day becoming a rap star. When a powerful drug lord’s cocaine is stolen and his girlfriend is caught cheating, all guns point to Cuervo and a bounty is put on his head. Suddenly, the cops and the underworld are both out for the money the drug lord has put on Cuervo’s head. Dodging bullets, back-stabbing babes and boys in the hood, Cuervo makes his way through the strange menagerie of characters that populate the darkness Cuervo finds himself in. Together, Cuervo and his homies use all of their skills to uncover who framed him. They must succeed or else it’s Rest In Peace Cuervo Jones!
response.title: Rest in Peace, Cuervo Jones
